mapper.select: SELECT odt.order_detail_id, pt.product_name, ct.color_name, sum(odt.count_number) as total_count, pt.product_price, sum(odt.count_number)*pt.product_price as total_price, rank() over (order by sum(odt.count_number) desc) as ranking FROM order_detail_tb odt left outer join order_tb ot on(ot.order_id = odt.order_id) left outer join product_tb pt on (pt.product_id = odt.product_id) left outer join user_tb ut on(ut.user_id = ot.user_id) left outer join color_tb ct on(ct.color_id = pt.color_id) group by pt.product_id order by total_count desc

SELECT odt.order_detail_id, pt.product_name, ct.color_name, sum(odt.count_number) as total_count, pt.product_price, sum(odt.count_number)*pt.product_price as total_price, rank() over (order by sum(odt.count_number)*pt.product_price desc) as ranking FROM order_detail_tb odt left outer join order_tb ot on(ot.order_id = odt.order_id) left outer join product_tb pt on (pt.product_id = odt.product_id) left outer join user_tb ut on(ut.user_id = ot.user_id) left outer join color_tb ct on(ct.color_id = pt.color_id) group by pt.product_id order by total_price desc

SELECT odt.order_detail_id, ut.name, ut.email, sum(odt.count_number) as order_count, sum(odt.count_number*pt.product_price) as total_money, rank() over (order by sum(odt.count_number*pt.product_price) desc) as ranking FROM order_detail_tb odt left outer join order_tb ot on(ot.order_id = odt.order_id) left outer join product_tb pt on (pt.product_id = odt.product_id) left outer join user_tb ut on(ut.user_id = ot.user_id) left outer join color_tb ct on(ct.color_id = pt.color_id) group by ut.name order by total_money desc
